title: Transformer-Based Physics Pedagogy Workshop for Non-Majors

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary education-level basic physics and mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: Job-linked education for pre-service and in-service teachers, incorporating smartphone-based assistive tools and project-centered learning applicable to field settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for interpreting physical phenomena by leveraging sequence analysis principles of transformer models
Learners can complete projects applying complex physics problems to real-world scenarios through deep learning-based simulations
Learners can construct a transformer-based instructional design framework for physics concept education

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
